name: Canvas_Bandit (demo)
description:
Canvas_Bandit has you creating pixel art on a blank canvas by shooting it with paintballs of different colors. 

This game is still in development, and will eventually have a narrative and expanded mechanics. For now, The walkie talkie tells you which spaces to shoot and what color to shoot at them. 

Z, X, C, V, B - Change paint color

Mouse - Aim and shoot

PLUS, MINUS - change zoom level

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Made in One Week for Optical Jam 5.
